subject: Delivery missing part: order Order #SSN2694
description_text:
Hi,
I ordered pedals +  hapitics and with a baseplate.

I received   CE326625174DE
<https://www.logistics.dhl/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=CE326625174DE>
 Pedals
I received SF6045931206922
<https://www.logistics.dhl/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=SF6045931206922>
Haptics
motors

*missing Baseplate*

Please Let me know as soon as possible

[image: image.png]
-- 
Cordiali Saluti,
Ing. Luca Bucci

Cell: +39 347 704 6352

THIS MESSAGE MAY CONTAIN INFORMATION THAT IS PRIVILEGED AND CONFIDENTIAL.
The information contained in, or attached to, this message is intended
solely for the use of the specific person(s) named above. If you are not
the intended recipient then you have received this communication in error
and are prohibited from review, retransmission, taking any action in
reliance upon, sharing the content of, disseminating or copying this
message and any of the attachments in any way. If you have received this
communication in error, please contact the sender immediately and promptly
delete this message from all types of media and devices. Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Common guys, what do you have to do? Are 5 days!  Could you ship me the baseplate that I paid. I cannot use anything without the baseplate.

Hi Luca Bucci,  We sincerely apologize for the delay. Our customer service team was unavailable during the National Day holiday (October 1st–8th). We have now resumed work, and I will immediately inform the operations team to look into your case and provide a quick solution.

Hi Luca Bucci,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Our Pro X Ultra baseplate is currently out of stock at our German warehouse, so we have sent you the pedal first. We can ship your baseplate via UPS, but customs duties may apply. Alternatively, we can reship it once the German warehouse restocks in next two days.

Hi,

I don't want to pay customs duties, so I'll wait for the baseplate from the
German warehouse.

Il giorno gio 9 ott 2025 alle ore 13:46 service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> ha scritto:

> Hi Luca Bucci,
>
> We apologize for the inconvenience. Our Pro X Ultra baseplate is currently
> out of stock at our German warehouse, so we have sent you the pedal first.
> We can ship your baseplate via UPS, but customs duties may apply.
> Alternatively, we can reship it once the German warehouse restocks in next
> two days.
>
> On Wed, 8 Oct at 9:49 PM , service@simsonn.com
